duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute partnership strategy to drive success of joint partnerships with Salesforce and other critical alliances.
Coordinate the launch of various integrations or joint solutions with Salesforce and other partners.
Engage directly with strategic customers, partners, and internal stakeholders as a primary point of contact on partnerships.
Collaborate with Marketing and Sales teams to build joint go-to-market plans, marketing engines, and sales strategies materials.
Drive sales enablement efforts around joint solutions across the global sales organization.

education_certification.credential: Minimum 7 years of relevant sales, business development or alliances experience
